law.catch_line: Liability for inaccurate information in filed record.
law.text: If a record delivered to the Secretary of State for filing under this chapter and filed by the Secretary of State contains inaccurate information, a person that suffers a loss by reliance on the information may recover damages for the loss from a person that signed the record or caused another to sign it on the personâ€™s behalf and knew at the time the record was signed that the information was inaccurate.
law.history: Created 2012 Ky. Acts ch. 160, sec. 17, effective July 12, 2012.
